Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:03.66]Your little brother never tells you but he loves you so
[00:07.26]You said your mother only smiled on her TV show
[00:11.30]You’re only happy when your sorry head is filled with dope
[00:15.23]I hope you make it to the day you’re 28 years old
[00:19.79]You’re dripping like a saturated sunrise
[00:23.74]You’re spilling like an overflowing sink
[00:27.58]You’re ripped at every edge but you’re a masterpiece
[00:31.58]And now I’m tearing through the pages and the ink
[00:34.30]
[00:37.28]Everything is blue
[00:38.90]His pills, his hands, his jeans
[00:41.53]And now I’m covered in the colors
[00:43.60]Pull apart at the seams
[00:45.33]And it's blue
[00:49.47]And it's blue
[00:53.01]Everything is grey
[00:54.93]His hair, his smoke, his dreams
[00:57.50]And now he's so devoid of color
[00:59.53]He don’t know what it means
[01:01.33]And he's blue
[01:05.34]And he's blue
[01:14.68]
[01:41.82]You were blue
[01:45.56]You were a vision in the morning when the light came through
[01:49.25]I know I’ve only felt religion when I’ve lied with you
[01:53.24]You said you’ll never be forgiven till your boys are too
[01:57.19]And I’m still waking every morning but it’s not with you
[02:01.86]You’re dripping like a saturated sunrise
[02:05.79]You’re spilling like an overflowing sink
[02:09.90]You’re ripped at every edge but you’re a masterpiece
[02:13.38]And now I’m tearing through the pages and the ink
[02:16.47]
[02:17.02]Everything is blue
[02:18.94]His pills, his hands, his jeans
[02:21.42]And now I’m covered in the colors
[02:23.44]Pull apart at the seams
[02:25.11]And it's blue
[02:29.35]And it's blue
[02:32.87]Everything is grey
[02:34.74]His hair, his smoke, his dreams
[02:37.31]And now he's so devoid of color
[02:39.54]He don’t know what it means
[02:41.11]And he's blue
[02:45.16]And he's blue
[02:51.60]
[03:21.39]Everything is grey
[03:22.91]His hair, his smoke, his dreams
[03:25.44]And now he's so devoid of color
[03:27.67]He don’t know what it means
[03:29.49]And he's blue
[03:33.43]And he's blue
[03:37.38]Everything is blue
